headline: ROVEMA WRAP AROUND CASE PACKER
description: Wrap Around Case Packer  New in 2000      High filling ratio as case envelopes contents precisely  Fast and problem free format size changes  Blank sizes between 500x400mm and 1200x1100mm  Performance up to 18 cycles/min possible  Industrial-PC control with user friendly Touch-Screen, ensures ease of operation Rovema WA 76
specstable:
Manufacturer Rovema
Model WA 76
Other Information Most standard transit and display cases can be produced by the wrap-around-method.
One-piece flat blanks, can be formed and glued, partially or completely
enveloping inner contents to form a convenient transit box.
Adhesive dispenser: Nordson 3500V Series
Condition Like New
Year of Manufacture 2000
Power Requirements 220/440 V 25.0 A 50/60 Hz 3 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 138.000 in (350.5 cm)
Depth 75.000 in (190.5 cm)
Height 84.000 in (213.4 cm)
